title: Unsoul'd
description: UNSOULâ€™ A DIRTY LITTLE FABLERandall Banner is thirty-five years old, a middling mid-list author who yearns for more of More attention. More fame. More money. More fans.Then, one quiet morning, he meets the devil while pounding away at his laptop at his usual coffee shop. Soon, a deal is made, a contract is signed, and Randall is on his way to fame and fortune unlike any he ever imagined.What follows is a bawdy, hilarious, yet harrowing tale of one man, one devil, and a deal that could change the world.
author: Barry Lyga
